item.title: § Building LLM System
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In recent years, the emergence of Large Language Models (LLMs) has revolutionized AI applications, providing new opportunities for solving complex problems with natural language understanding and generation.

item.title: Devbox: Your Ultimate Dev Environment Companion
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Why Devbox? The Big Picture The Game-Changing Reasons to Choose Devbox The Building Blocks Devbox: Supercharge Your Development Workflow Devbox Services: Tame Complex Setups with Ease Devbox Plugins: Extend and Customize Like a Pro From Zero to Hero Craft Your Perfect Shell with Devbox Devbox.

item.title: How to make a MOC
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This memo explains how to create a Map of Content (MOC) for our knowledge hubs. The concept was introduced by Nick Milo, who also runs courses on Linking Your Thinking.
